content:
I received a pile of errors on running the IG Publisher:
"The image source 'tbl_vjoin_end_slice.png' cannot be resolved"

So I assumed that I did not have an updated IG pack. When I went to download the IG Pack, I noticed the link down. http://build.fhir.org/igpack.zip
If that won't fix my errors, does anyone have guidance?
Thanks

not guidance, but I had the same problem and copied the files from the fhir build to my ig pages directory: tbl_vjoin_end_slice.png, tbl_vjoin_end_slicer.png, tbl_vjoin_slice.png, tbl_vjoin_slicer.png, tbl_vline_slice.png,tbl_vline_slicer.png
@Oliver Egger if you name your ig file ig.json not chmed16af.json you can use the auto-publishing infrastructure (but you don't have to)
If you're building against a release other than the current release, those image files won't be in the IGPacks.
Do you want to add them to the old packs?
I'll send you the patched ones for upload
@Grahame Grieve thanks for the hint, autopublishing is on my todolist, i integrate that. and yes my ig's are r3 version, so that would be very helpful if the icons are integrated in that version too!

Yes that would help me too.

One other strange error I'm getting: 

Profile http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImplementationGuide, Element 'ImplementationGuide.package.resource[87].example': minimum required = 1, but only found 0

I definitely have an example field, as it was required in R3 (but apparently no longer in R4). If anyone has suggestions I would appreciate it.
Yes I noticed this as well the ig publisher strips off the <example value="false"/> from the ig resource - I think I made a tracker lemme see...
